author: Salvatore Calabrese
description: Your choice of genever and orange curaçao greatly effects the balance of this cocktail. Salvatore uses Rutte Old Simon which is not only a fantastic genever with an attractive nutty character but also befits the name. The choice of a drier, high alcohol curaçao obviously produces a correspondingly drier drink.
name: Mr Simon

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
